meanings.definition: Develop or improve (something) by making changes to its structure or form.
meanings.sent1: The old playground was redeveloped into a beautiful park.
meanings.sent2: The city council decided to redevelop the downtown area to attract more visitors.
meanings.sent3: The toy car was redeveloped into a flying machine, much to the surprise of the children.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence was redeveloped like a flower blooming after a long winter.
meanings.sent5: The once deserted factory was redeveloped into a bustling shopping center.

meanings.definition: To renovate or rebuild (an area or building) for a new purpose.
meanings.sent1: The company redeveloped the old warehouse into a modern office space.
meanings.sent2: The government plans to redevelop the waterfront for recreational activities.
meanings.sent3: The haunted house was redeveloped into a cozy bed and breakfast, much to the ghosts' dismay.
meanings.sent4: Her life was redeveloped like a blank canvas turned into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The historic theater was redeveloped into a state-of-the-art cinema.
